subject: FROM—JIMMY HOWARD
body:
FROM—JIMMY HOWARD
ADDRESS--Verkstadsvagen 11,Igh  1301 S-59146 Motala Sweden
EUROPEAN UNION
ATTN:SIR/MADAM.
I AM MR.JIMMY HOWARD, 
DIRECTOR OF, MONITORING OFFICE AND CONTROL  AFFAIRS DEPARTMENT OF ALL BANKS AND FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS IN EUROPEAN UNION ON CONCERNED FOREIGN CONTRACT PAYMENTS
. I AM THE FINAL SIGNATORY TO ALL FOREIGN TRANSFERS OF HUGE FUNDS MOVING WITHIN BANKS BOTH THE LOCAL AND INTERNATIONAL LEVELS IN LINE TO FOREIGN CONTRACTS SETTLEMENT. I HAVE BEFORE ME THE LIST OF FOREIGN CONTRACT PAYMENT FILES, WHICH ARE DUE TO BE TRANSFERRED TO THEIR NOMINATED  BANK ACCOUNTS.MEANWHILE, WE IDENTIFIED SOME OF THESE ACCOUNTS TO BE GHOST ACCOUNTS, UNCLAIMED DEPOSITS AND OVER INVOICED SUM ETC. I WISH TO HAVE A DEAL WITH YOU AS REGARDS TO THE UNPAID FUND. I HAVE A FILE BEFORE ME AND HOPE THE DATES ARE CORRECT AND UN-TAMPERED. AS IT IS MY DUTY TO RECOMMEND THE TRANSFER OF THESE SURPLUS FUNDS TO THE EUROPEAN UNION GOVERNMENT TREASURY AND RESERVE ACCOUNTS AS UNCLAIMED DEPOSIT. I HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY TO WRITE YOU BASED ON THE INSTRUCTION I RECEIVED TWO DAYS AGO FROM THE SENATE COMMITTEE ON CONTRACT PAYMENT/FOREIGN DEBTS TO SUBMIT THE LIST OF PAYMENT REPORTS EXPENDITURES AND AUDITED REPORTS OF REVENUES. AMONG SEVERAL OTHERS, I HAVE DECIDED TO REMIT THE TOTAL SUM OF €16.2 MILLION FOLLOWING THE IDEA THAT WE HAVE A DEAL/AGREEMENT AND I AM GOING TO PER FACT THE PAPERWORK LEGALLY.MY CONDITIONS
1. YOU WILL HAVE TO PROVIDE BANK ACCOUNT WHERE THE FUNDS WILL BE TRANSFERRED.
2. THIS DEAL MUST BE KEPT SECRET FOREVER, AND ALL CORRESPONDENCE WILL BE STRICTLY BY PRIVATE EMAIL /TELEPHONE FOR SECURITY PURPOSES.
3. THERE SHOULD BE NO OTHER THIRD PARTIES AS MOST PROBLEMS ASSOCIATED WITH SUCH PAYMENTS ARE CAUSED BY THEIR AGENTS OR REPRESENTATIVES. IF YOU AGREE WITH MY CONDITIONS, CONTACT ME DIRECTLY THROUGH THIS EMAIL  
jimmyhoward@consultant.com
    WILL ADVISE YOU ON THE NEXT LINE OF ACTION AND IMMEDIATELY THE FUNDS TRANSFER WILL COMMENCE WITHOUT FURTHER DELAY AS I WOULD PROCEED TO FIX YOUR NAME ON THE PAYMENT SCHEDULE INSTANTLY WITHIN THE NEXT 5 WORKING DAYS.NOTE:
DUE TO THE HIGH RATES OF INTERNET SCAMMERS,IF YOU ARE REPLYING TO THIS EMAIL,DO WRITE "YOUR BROTHER" AT THE SUBJECT OF YOUR REPLY ,THAT SERVES AS OUR SECRET CODE FOR THIS TRANSACTION,BECAUSE I DO NOT WANT YOU TO FALL VICTIM OF ANY CIRCUMSTANCES
THANKS
YOURS FAITHFULLY
MR.JIMMY HOWARD

subject: Re: FROM—JIMMY HOWARD
body:
Hello Jimmy Howard,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this email finds you well. I am interested in learning more about the unpaid funds and how we can proceed with the transfer. Could you please provide me with some additional details?

1. What is the total amount of the funds that are due to be transferred?
2. Can you explain further what you mean by "ghost accounts" and "unclaimed deposits"?
3. How did you come across my contact information for this opportunity?
4. Is there any specific reason why this deal must be kept secret?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: FROM—JIMMY HOWARD
body:
Hello-Mr Charles 
 I received your email and Contents noted. 
 
 However, on your questions 
 
 A--The Total amount approved was $4.5 Million. 
 B--Ghost account and unclaimed deposit is some people that used as beneficiary but their names was not in the payment file. 
 C--Your name was in the payment file from the European Union Payment Reconcilation department. 
 D--The reason to keep it confidential is that there are many scams so that the paying bank will know the beneficiary that his or fund was approved to avoid identify theft. 
 I want you to contact the paying bank with the below information and do include the Reference Number and Contract Number for the HSBC to make sure that you are the beneficiary of the fund. 
 Bank Name:- HSBC Bank SPAIN 
 Address--- Pl. Pablo Ruiz Picasso,55, Tetuán, 28020 Madrid 
 Email:- ( hsbcbankk@spainmail.com (mailto:hsbcbankk@spainmail.com) 
 Contact Person---Newman Wood 
 Telephone--+34 602 85 85 44 
 Contractor Name---Your Name and Address/Phone 
 Contract Number:- N.K.S/245/0682/24 
 Payment Ref Number:- N.V.F/989/24 
 Contract Amt :-€4.5 MILLION Euros 
 Kindly contact the HSBC Bank Spain on the above Email and Phone and Once you receive correspondence from the bank endeavor to let me know so I can guide you through to avoid any mistakes and you should keep everything concern this payment for yourself till the total fund is confirm in your bank account. 
 I await your prompt response 
 Mr. Jimmy Howard 
 jimmyhoward@consultant.com (mailto:jimmyhoward@consultant.com) 
 
 
 
 Sent: Friday, February 09, 2024 at 6:28 AM From: "Charles" <tz32530@***.com> To: jimmyhoward@consultant.com Subject: Re: FROM—JIMMY HOWARD 
 
Hello Jimmy Howard, 
Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this email finds you well. I am interested in learning more about the unpaid funds and how we can proceed with the transfer. Could you please provide me with some additional details? 
1. What is the total amount of the funds that are due to be transferred? 
2. Can you explain further what you mean by "ghost accounts" and "unclaimed deposits"? 
3. How did you come across my contact information for this opportunity? 
4. Is there any specific reason why this deal must be kept secret? 
I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing back from you soon.
Best wishes, 
Charles
